verses.verse: וְזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הַמִּצְוָ֗ה <S%H4687><s%> Now these [are] the commandments הַֽחֻקִּים֙ <S%H2706><s%> the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֛ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God לְלַמֵּ֣ד <S%H3925><s%> to teach אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> you that ye might do בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [them] in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <S%H5674><s%> whither ye go שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to possess

לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> so תִּירָ֜א <S%H3372><s%> That thou mightest fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לִ֠שְׁמֹר <S%H8104><s%> to keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֻקֹּתָ֣יו <S%H2708><s%> all his statutes וּמִצְוֹתָיו֮ <S%H4687><s%> and his commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּךָ֒ <S%H6680><s%> which I command אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וּבִנְךָ֣ <S%H1121><s%> thee thou and thy son וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> and thy son's בִּנְךָ֔ <S%H1121><s%> son כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיֶּ֑יךָ <S%H2416><s%> of thy life וּלְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> so יַאֲרִכֻ֥ן <S%H748><s%> may be prolonged יָמֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3117><s%> and that thy days

וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <S%H8085><s%> Hear יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> therefore O Israel וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H8104><s%> and observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> that יִיטַ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> [it] that it may be well לְךָ֔ וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after תִּרְבּ֖וּן <S%H7235><s%> with thee and that ye may increase מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> mightily כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> hath promised יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> of thy fathers לָ֔ךְ אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee in the land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> and honey פ
שְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> LORD אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> [is] one

וְאָ֣הַבְתָּ֔ <S%H157><s%> And thou shalt love אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבָבְךָ֥ <S%H3824><s%> with all thine heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> and with all thy soul וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְאֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3966><s%> and with all thy might

וְהָי֞וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> And these words הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֧י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon לְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3824><s%> shall be in thine heart

וְשִׁנַּנְתָּ֣ם <S%H8150><s%> And thou shalt teach them diligently לְבָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H1121><s%> unto thy children וְדִבַּרְתָּ֖ <S%H1696><s%> and shalt talk בָּ֑ם בְּשִׁבְתְּךָ֤ <S%H3427><s%> of them when thou sittest בְּבֵיתֶ֙ךָ֙ <S%H1004><s%> in thine house וּבְלֶכְתְּךָ֣ <S%H1980><s%> walk בַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way וּֽבְשָׁכְבְּךָ֖ <S%H7901><s%> and when thou liest down וּבְקוּמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6965><s%> and when thou risest up

וּקְשַׁרְתָּ֥ם <S%H7194><s%> And thou shalt bind לְא֖וֹת <S%H226><s%> them for a sign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> upon thine hand וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall be as לְטֹטָפֹ֖ת <S%H2903><s%> and they shall be as frontlets בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> among עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> between thine eyes

וּכְתַבְתָּ֛ם <S%H3789><s%> And thou shalt write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מְזוּזֹ֥ת <S%H4201><s%> them upon the posts בֵּיתֶ֖ךָ <S%H1004><s%> of thy house וּבִשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8179><s%> and on thy gates ס

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> when יְבִיאֲךָ֣ ׀ <S%H935><s%> shall have brought יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And it shall be when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee into the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <S%H7650><s%> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> and to Jacob לָ֣תֶת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָ֑ךְ עָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> cities גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <S%H1419><s%> thee great וְטֹבֹ֖ת <S%H2896><s%> and goodly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not בָנִֽיתָ׃ <S%H1129><s%> which thou buildedst

וּבָ֨תִּ֜ים <S%H1004><s%> And houses מְלֵאִ֣ים <S%H4392><s%> full כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all טוּב֮ <S%H2898><s%> of all good אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not מִלֵּאתָ֒ <S%H4390><s%> [things] which thou filledst וּבֹרֹ֤ת <S%H953><s%> not and wells חֲצוּבִים֙ <S%H2672><s%> digged אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not חָצַ֔בְתָּ <S%H2672><s%> which thou diggedst כְּרָמִ֥ים <S%H3754><s%> not vineyards וְזֵיתִ֖ים <S%H2132><s%> and olive trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נָטָ֑עְתָּ <S%H5193><s%> which thou plantedst וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <S%H398><s%> not when thou shalt have eaten וְשָׂבָֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H7646><s%> and be full

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> [Then] beware לְךָ֔ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> not תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <S%H7911><s%> lest thou forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who הוֹצִֽיאֲךָ֛ <S%H3318><s%> which brought thee forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> of bondage

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God תִּירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> Thou shalt fear וְאֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> תַעֲבֹ֑ד <S%H5647><s%> and serve וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> by his name תִּשָּׁבֵֽעַ׃ <S%H7650><s%> him and shalt swear

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵֽלְכ֔וּן <S%H1980><s%> along אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> other מֵאֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> of the gods הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5439><s%> which [are] round about

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God קַנָּ֛א <S%H7067><s%> [is] a jealous יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> (For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7130><s%> among פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise יֶ֠חֱרֶה <S%H2734><s%> be kindled אַף־ <S%H639><s%> you) lest the anger יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God בָּ֔ךְ וְהִשְׁמִ֣ידְךָ֔ <S%H8045><s%> against thee and destroy מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> thee from off the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> of the earth ס

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְנַסּ֔וּ <S%H5254><s%> Ye shall not tempt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after נִסִּיתֶ֖ם <S%H5254><s%> as ye tempted בַּמַּסָּֽה׃ <S%H4532><s%> [him] in Massah

שָׁמ֣וֹר <S%H8104><s%> Ye shall diligently תִּשְׁמְר֔וּן <S%H8104><s%> keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְעֵדֹתָ֥יו <S%H5713><s%> and his testimonies וְחֻקָּ֖יו <S%H2706><s%> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּֽךְ׃ <S%H6680><s%> which he hath commanded

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt do הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which is] right וְהַטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and good בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> that it יִ֣יטַב <S%H3190><s%> that it may be well לָ֔ךְ וּבָ֗אתָ <S%H935><s%> with thee and that thou mayest go in וְיָֽרַשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַטֹּבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> the good אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> sware יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers

לַהֲדֹ֥ף <S%H1920><s%> To cast out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <S%H341><s%> all thine enemies מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from before כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> thee as the LORD ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יִשְׁאָלְךָ֥ <S%H7592><s%> asketh בִנְךָ֛ <S%H1121><s%> [And] when thy son מָחָ֖ר <S%H4279><s%> thee in time to come לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What הָעֵדֹ֗ת <S%H5713><s%> What [mean] the testimonies וְהַֽחֻקִּים֙ <S%H2706><s%> and the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֛ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> Then thou shalt say לְבִנְךָ֔ <S%H1121><s%> unto thy son עֲבָדִ֛ים <S%H5650><s%> bondmen הָיִ֥ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְפַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> We were Pharaoh's בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וַיּוֹצִיאֵ֧נוּ <S%H3318><s%> brought us out יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בְּיָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand חֲזָקָֽה׃ <S%H2389><s%> with a mighty

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> shewed יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אוֹתֹ֣ת <S%H226><s%> signs וּ֠מֹפְתִים <S%H4159><s%> and wonders גְּדֹלִ֨ים <S%H1419><s%> great וְרָעִ֧ים ׀ <S%H7451><s%> and sore בְּמִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> upon Egypt בְּפַרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and upon all his household לְעֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5869><s%> before our eyes

וְאוֹתָ֖נוּ <S%H853><s%> הוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> And he brought us out מִשָּׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> order הָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> from thence that he might bring us in אֹתָ֔נוּ <S%H853><s%> לָ֤תֶת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> us the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <S%H7650><s%> which he sware לַאֲבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> unto our fathers

וַיְצַוֵּ֣נוּ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> us to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַחֻקִּ֣ים <S%H2706><s%> all these statutes הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לְיִרְאָ֖ה <S%H3372><s%> to fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God לְט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for our good לָ֙נוּ֙ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> always לְחַיֹּתֵ֖נוּ <S%H2421><s%> that he might preserve us alive כְּהַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> It

וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> And it shall be our righteousness תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לָּ֑נוּ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if נִשְׁמֹ֨ר <S%H8104><s%> if we observe לַעֲשׂ֜וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <S%H4687><s%> commandments הַזֹּ֗את <S%H2063><s%> all these לִפְנֵ֛י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he צִוָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H6680><s%> as he hath commanded ס
